    • Field Detail

      • DATEPATTERN

        public static final java.lang.String DATEPATTERN
        Defines the format of each string that represent a date in our project. The pattern is "dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm:ss"
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Parameters:
        width - of the coordinate system
        height - of the coordinate system
        step - the distance between the ticks
        origin - the point where the two axes meet
        g - the Graphics component used to draw the coordinate system
